moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Manage Driver Loader
moduleMetadataJson.description: This module loads a KMD (Kernel Mode Driver) using the Windows Service API.
author: Borja Merino <bmerinofe@gmail.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: START_TYPE
options.description: Start type. (Accepted: boot, system, auto, demand, disabled)

options.name: SERVICE_TYPE
options.description: Service type. (Accepted: kernel, file_system, adapter, recognizer)

options.name: ERROR_TYPE
options.description: Error type. (Accepted: ignore, normal, severe, critical)
